script.description: Transforms a ZedAI (DAISY 4 XML) document into an PEF.

option.desc: Identifier (URL) of a custom preprocessor unit (XProc step).
option.name: preprocessor

option.desc: Whether or not to include a preview of the PEF in HTML (true or false).
option.name: preview

option.desc: Identifier (URL) of the translator (XSLT or XProc step or liblouis table) to be used. Defaults to a simple generic liblouis-based translator.
option.name: translator

option.desc: Path to output directory for the PEF.
option.name: output-dir

option.desc: The default css stylesheet to apply when there aren't any provided with the input file.
option.name: stylesheet

option.desc: Path to directory for storing temporary files.
option.name: temp-dir
